oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Biennial Workshop on the Smut Fungi, 5; Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, Mexico; 28-30 Apr 1986. Proceedings
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wheats
Zea mays
Smuts
Tilletia
Sphacelotheca
Urocystis
Ustilago
Plant diseases
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Fifth Biennial Smut Workers' Workshop, held at Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, Mexico, was of particular interest because it provided the opportunity to discuss research being conducted on Karnal bunt, disease that has become a problem to Mexico and CIMMYT due to the threat it poses to grain exportation and the distribution of international trials. This document contains brief abstracts of the 27 papers presented at the workshop
